description:
Komachi Ono (小野 小町, Ono Komachi) is a female police officer from the Japanese anime series KochiKame, by Osamu Akimoto. Komachi is appointed within the Transport Department of the Katsushika Police Headquarters. She only appears in the anime series. She is usually seen along with Naoko, who is both her colleague and best friend.
Komachi was born on February 21st, and has been inferred to be 22 years old. Komachi grew up in Oinaka, a small town in the countryside of the Kanagawa Prefecture, and still visits her family in her hometown in summer and winter. Her parents think that Ryotsu is Komachi`s boyfriend.
She`s notable for being both Ryotsu`s main rival and love interest.
name: Ono Komachi
